All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
AdminAlertController
REST controller for admin access to alert data.
AdminDeviceCommandController
REST controller for managing device commands (admin only).
AdminDeviceStatusController
REST controller for device status monitoring (admin only).
AdminSensorDataController
REST controller for admin access to sensor data.
Alert
Represents an alert generated by the system.
AlertController
REST controller for user access to alert data.
AlertRepository
Repository interface for alert persistence operations.
AlertService
Service class for alert-related business logic.
AlertType
Enumeration of alert types generated by the system.
AuthController
REST controller for user authentication and session management.
AuthInterceptor
Spring MVC interceptor for authentication and authorization.
AuthTokenService
Service for managing authentication tokens and user sessions.
AuthTokenService.Session
Represents an authenticated user session.
DataInitializer
Configuration class for initializing default data on application startup.
DeviceCommand
Represents a command sent to the ESP32 device.
DeviceCommandPayload
Data Transfer Object for device command creation requests.
DeviceCommandRepository
Repository interface for device command persistence operations.
DeviceCommandResponse
Data Transfer Object for device command responses.
DeviceConfig
Represents device configuration for ESP32 network settings.
DeviceConfigRepository
Repository interface for device configuration persistence operations.
DeviceConfigResponse
Data Transfer Object for device configuration responses.
DeviceConfigUpdateRequest
Data Transfer Object for device configuration update requests.
DeviceSensorController
REST controller for ESP32 device communication.
DeviceStatusResponse
Data Transfer Object for device status information.
EcoguardApplication
Main application class for EcoGuard Environmental Monitoring System.
FirebaseConfig
Initializes Firebase Admin SDK using the service account in resources.
HealthController
REST controller for system health monitoring.
MetricType
Enumeration of environmental metrics monitored by the system.
Notification
Represents a notification sent to a user for an alert.
NotificationRepository
Repository interface for notification persistence operations.
PasswordConfig
Configuration class for password encoding.
PushNotificationService
Thin wrapper around FirebaseMessaging to send push notifications to a device token.
Role
User role enumeration for access control.
SensorData
Represents a sensor reading from the ESP32 device.
SensorDataController
REST controller for user access to sensor data.
SensorDataDto
Data Transfer Object for sensor data (simplified format).
SensorDataPayload
Data Transfer Object for sensor data ingestion from ESP32 device.
SensorDataRepository
Repository interface for sensor data persistence operations.
SensorDataService
Service class for sensor data-related business logic.
Threshold
Represents a threshold configuration for environmental metrics.
ThresholdAudit
Audit trail entity for tracking threshold configuration changes.
ThresholdAuditRepository
Repository interface for threshold audit trail persistence operations.
ThresholdAuditResponse
Data Transfer Object for threshold audit trail records.
ThresholdController
REST controller for managing environmental threshold configurations.
ThresholdDeviceResponse
Data Transfer Object for threshold data sent to ESP32 device.
ThresholdPayload
Data Transfer Object for threshold update requests.
ThresholdRepository
Repository interface for threshold configuration persistence operations.
ThresholdService
Service class for threshold-related business logic.
User
Represents a user in the EcoGuard system.
UserRepository
Repository interface for user persistence operations.
UserThresholdController
REST controller for user access to threshold configurations.
WebConfig
Spring MVC configuration for CORS and interceptors.
